original_text: And the king of Babylon made Mattaniah his father's brother king in his stead, and changed his name to Zedekiah.
korean_text: 바벨론 왕이 또 여호야긴의 숙부 맛다니야를 대신하여 왕으로 삼고 그의 이름을 고쳐 시드기야라 하였더라

sentences.original_text: And the king of Babylon made Mattaniah
his father's brother king in his stead
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아버지의 동생을 대신하여 왕으로 삼았으며

sentences.original_text: and changed his name to Zedekiah
